reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Sharma is an excellent professor. Her lectures are engaging, and she is always willing to help students during office hours. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Williamson's class was challenging, but I learned a lot. He could be a bit strict, but I appreciated his high standards.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is hands down the best biology professor I've had. Her passion for the subject is contagious, and she makes the material easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: I struggled a lot in Prof. Chen's class. His lectures were dry, and he didn't seem interested in helping students who were falling behind.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen is a brilliant scholar and a caring professor. Her feedback on my essays was invaluable, and she really helped me improve my writing skills.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Gonzalez's class was interesting, but he sometimes seemed disorganized. The workload was also a bit heavy for a lower-level course.

reviews.subject: French
reviews.review: Dr. Dubois is an amazing language instructor. Her classes are fun and engaging, and she really helps students improve their French proficiency.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Murphy is a knowledgeable and practical instructor. His lectures are relevant to real-world business challenges, and he provides valuable insights.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is a passionate and insightful professor. Her lectures are thought-provoking, and she encourages students to engage in class discussions.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Fitzgerald's class was quite challenging, but I learned a lot. He is a brilliant physicist, but his teaching style could be improved.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Tanaka is an exceptional professor. Her passion for art is contagious, and she brings the subject to life through engaging lectures and insightful discussions.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Kim is a knowledgeable and approachable instructor. His classes are well-structured, and he is always available to help students during office hours.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Rodrigues is a passionate and dedicated professor. Her lectures are informative, and she encourages students to think critically about environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Prof. Hernandez is an excellent nursing instructor. Her hands-on teaching style and real-world experience make her classes invaluable for aspiring nurses.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Barbieri's lectures can be a bit dry, but the material is fascinating. He is knowledgeable, but I wished he engaged with students more during class.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Patel is a great marketing instructor. Her classes are practical and relevant, and she provides valuable insights into the industry.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. O'Malley is a thoughtful and engaging professor. His lectures are well-researched and thought-provoking, and he encourages lively discussions in class.

reviews.subject: Accounting
reviews.review: Prof. Nguyen's class was challenging, but I learned a lot. She is strict, but I appreciate that she holds students to high standards.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Sharma is a knowledgeable and accessible professor. His lectures are clear, and he is always willing to provide additional support to students.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Moreau is an exceptional sociologist and a fantastic professor. Her lectures are engaging, and she encourages critical thinking and discussion.
